titles: The life and death of Alexander the Great, King of Macedon in ten books / by Curtius Rufus ... done into English by the same hand that translated the last volume of The holy court.
author: Curtius Rufus, Quintus.
Codrington, Robert, 1601-1665.
publisher: Printed for S.S. and are to be sold by Nich. Cox ...,
notes: "Epistle dediatory" and "To the reader" signed: Robert Codrington.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
